javascript:!function(){var o={};o.copyToClipboard=void 0,o.copyToClipboard=function(e,o,n){var i;n&&((i=n.createElement("button")).setAttribute("style",["position: fixed","top: 0px","left: 0px","z-index: 99999","background: lightgreen","border: 2px solid black","border: color: black","letter-spacing: normal","word-spacing: normal","text-transform: none","text-indent: 0px","text-shadow: none","display: inline-block","text-align: center","cursor: default","box-sizing: border-box","margin: 0em","font: 400 20pt Arial"].join(";")),i.textContent=o,n.body.appendChild(i),i.onclick=function(){var o,t;"function"==typeof(null===(o=navigator.clipboard)||void 0===o?void 0:o.writeText)?navigator.clipboard.writeText(e).then(function(){console.log("Content copied to clipboard")},function(){console.log("Failed to copy content to clipboard")}):(console.log("Attempting old-school copy"),(t=n.createElement("textarea")).setAttribute("style","width: 0px; height:0px"),n.body.appendChild(t),t.value=e,setTimeout(function(){t.select(),t.setSelectionRange(0,99999),n.execCommand("copy"),n.body.removeChild(t)},1)),n.body.removeChild(i)})};var t=document.title.replace(/[\|\[\(\]\)]/g," ").replace(/\s+/g," ").trim(),e=document.location.href;o.copyToClipboard('<li>\n\t<a href="'+encodeURI(e)+'">\n\t\t'+t+"\n\t</a>\n</li>","Copy Page URL HTML to Clipboard",document)}();
